lang_msg_pw_rule1: Password should be at least 8 characters long.
lang_msg_pw_rule2: ID may not be used as password.
lang_msg_pw_rule3: If the password is 8 to 9 characters long, then it must include a combination of at least 3 of the following character types: alphabet letters with uppercase or lowercase, numbers, and special characters.
lang_msg_pw_rule4: If the password is longer than 10 characters, then it must include a combination of at least 2 of the following character types: alphabet letters with uppercase or lowercase, numbers, and special characters.
lang_msg_pw_rule5: You may not use the same character 4 or more times, or the same character 4 or more times consecutively.
lang_msg_pw_rule6: If the password is 8 to 9 characters long, then it must include a combination of at least 3 of the following character types: alphabet letters with uppercase or lowercase, numbers, and special characters.
lang_msg_pw_rule7: If the password is longer than 10 characters, then it must include a combination of at least 2 of the following character types: alphabet letters with uppercase or lowercase, numbers, and special characters.
lang_msg_pw_rule8: User name may not be used as password.
lang_msg_pw_rule9: The following special characters can be used: ~`!@#$%^*()_-+=|{}[].?/.
lang_msg_pw_rule10: You may not use more than 4 consecutive characters. (example: 1234, abcd, etc.)
lang_msg_pw_rule11: You may not use the same character 4 or more times consecutively. (example: !!!!, 1111, aaaa, etc.)
